        pushl  %eax
        irmovl t,%eax
        pushl  %eax

        rmmovl %eax,s

        addl   %ebx,%eax
        iaddl  4,%edx
        isubl  1,%ecx

        ret

        .align 4
n:      .long  4

        .long  0x00b0
        .long  0x0c00
